tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE luxury_travel_packages (
    package_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    package_name TEXT,
    destination TEXT,
    availability BOOLEAN,
    price DECIMAL(10, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE travel_packages (
  package_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  package_name VARCHAR(255),
  destination VARCHAR(255),
  price DECIMAL(10, 2),
  availability BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE bookings (
  booking_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  package_id INT,
  user_id INT,
  booking_date DATE,
  confirmation_status VARCHAR(50),
  FOREIGN KEY (package_id) REFERENCES travel_packages(package_id)
);

CREATE TABLE luxury_travel_package (
	package_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	package_name VARCHAR(255),
	location VARCHAR(255),
	price DECIMAL(10, 2),
	availability BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE booking (
	booking_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	package_id INT,
	customer_name VARCHAR(255),
	booking_date DATE,
	FOREIGN KEY (package_id) REFERENCES luxury_travel_package(package_id)
);

CREATE TABLE reservation_confirmation (
	confirm_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	booking_id INT,
	confirm_date DATE,
	confirmation_status VARCHAR(50),
	FOREIGN KEY (booking_id) REFERENCES booking(booking_id)
);

CREATE TABLE luxury_travel_packages (
  package_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  package_name VARCHAR(255),
  description TEXT,
  price DECIMAL(10, 2),
  availability BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE experiences (
  experience_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  experience_name VARCHAR(255),
  location VARCHAR(100),
  duration INT,
  price DECIMAL(10, 2),
  availability BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE bookings (
  booking_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  package_id INT,
  experience_id INT,
  customer_name VARCHAR(255),
  booking_date DATE,
  confirmation_code VARCHAR(10)
);

CREATE TABLE reviews (
  review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  package_id INT,
  experience_id INT,
  rating INT,
  comment TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE experiences (
    experience_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    experience_name TEXT NOT NULL,
    location TEXT NOT NULL,
    duration_hours INT NOT NULL,
    price DECIMAL NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE users (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name TEXT NOT NULL,
    last_name TEXT NOT NULL,
    email TEXT NOT NULL UNIQUE,
    phone_number TEXT
);
